text: Yasmā ca kho bhikkhave rūpaṃ anattā tasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattati na ca labbhati rūpe evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī ti
edit: Yasmā ca kho bhikkhave rūpaṃ anattā tasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattati na ca labbhati rūpe – evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī ti

translations.transtext: Because, monks, form [is] nonself, therefore form exists for illness, and [one] does not obtain the form thus, "May my form be in this way, may my form not have been in this way."
